attributes.action: Income tax relief on Mortgage Interest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned believe that it is time to lower the tax burden on hard pressed family budgets and re-introduce mortgage tax relief. It is time to lower the tax burden given the sharp increase in family costs, not reflected in massaged inflation figures. We seek Morgage Interest Tax relief on the first £300,000 of Mortgage Interest

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
